text: Sex and Lucia () is a 2001 Spanish romantic drama movie written and directed by Julio Medem and starring Paz Vega, Tristán Ulloa, Najwa Nimri, Daniel Freire, Javier Cámara, Silvia Llanos, Elena Anaya. It won 2 Goya Awards and was nominated for 8 Goya Awards in 2002. == Other websites == * * * * * Category:2001 romantic drama movies Category:Spanish romance movies Category:Spanish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Julio Medem
title: Sex and Lucia
